channel.title: Broken .357_Magnum wiki link
channel.description:
I'm getting "403 Forbidden" when clicking [url='https://wiki.blackmesasource.com/.357_Magnum']https://wiki.blackmesasource.com/.357_Magnum[/url]
The redirect link still works though [url]https://wiki.blackmesasource.com/Magnum[/url]
I'm seeing the problem on both Safari and Firefox.
Same problem with [url]https://wiki.blackmesasource.com/.357_Magnum_Bullets[/url] and [url]https://wiki.blackmesasource.com/.50_Cal[/url]

item.title: Broken .357_Magnum wiki link
item.dc:creator: Skitch
item.description:
I tried again today and it works. Thanks for fixing it!

item.title: Broken .357_Magnum wiki link
item.dc:creator: FireTime
item.description:
I’m fairly certain it’s a mod re-write issue. We had these last time updated servers. I’ll be working with RM to sort these out shortly.

Sent from my phone using Tapatalk
